did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: Collection contains materials regarding the operation of a grocery store in Blacksburg, Virginia from 1845-1883.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Rufus Sarvey Papers must be obtained from the Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Rufus Sarvey Papers, Ms62-003, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Rufus Sarvey Papers commenced in September 2006 and was completed in September 2006.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Rufus Sarvey operated a grocery store in Blacksburg, Virginia from the mid-to-late nineteenth-century. In 1879, Sarvey entered into a partnership with Thomas A. Conrad. Four years later, Sarvey sold his stock of merchandise to Charles Lyle.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of account books, a partnership agreement, and an agreement of sale involving a grocery store operated by Rufus Sarvey between 1845 and 1883.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional records from Sarvey's store can be found in the Sarvay-Lyle Ledger, Ms2011-067. Entries in the ledger date from 1881 through 1888.
